name: Silhouette Showdown Archive
description:
All the previous versions of Silhouette Showdown!

Play version 0.1 online

Download version 0.2 to version 0.7 to play on your pc.

Some versions do not have downloadable files. Apple also made it more difficult for godot developers to make their apps as of version 0.5, so that's where the Mac versions end.

Check the devlog on the original game to see what changed in each version:

https://weentermakesgames.itch.io/silhouette-showdown/devlog

You can find the controls in the description of Silhouette Showdown:

https://weentermakesgames.itch.io/silhouette-showdown
